title: Dr. Lucie Guibault on What Scientists Should Know About Open Access
description: In response to the global health emergency caused by COVID-19, we’ve seen an array of organizations, publications, and governments make COVID-19 related research open access. For example, the U.S. National Library of Medicine recently released the COVID-19 Op…
